Football (College)
lead_paragraph: If L.S.U.’s football program were underfinanced, an outcry would ensue, but gutting the foreign language department generates only a comparative whisper.
snippet: If L.S.U.’s football program were underfinanced, an outcry would ensue, but gutting the foreign language department generates only a comparative whisper.
